thread.title: The internet is (quite rightly) going nuts for this video of the U.S. Democratic debate
thread.title_full: WTF | Watch: The internet is (quite rightly) going nuts for this video of the U.S. Democratic debate - entertainment.ie

author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: The internet is (quite rightly) going nuts for this video of the U.S. Democratic debate
text:
And with good reason.
The below video is the work of T. Kyle MacMahon , a GIF and internet meme genius and graphic designer from New York who spends most of his time making excellent GIFs of reality TV and pop culture moments for us all to enjoy.
And when he's not busy doing that, he's busy making the democratic candidates hoping to run for U.S. President in 2016 stand for the real national anthem of America.
My favorite moment from the Democratic Debate: pic.twitter.com/MNZN99TyIB
â€” T. Kyle (@tkylemac) October 14, 2015 Now that of course is not what really went down, with Sheryl Crow singing the actual anthem before Tuesday night's debate which was weird but not quite as enjoyable as the above.
Via Twitter
